Uses of Class
com.projetloki.genesis.PseudoClass

  • Packages that use PseudoClass 
    Package Description
    com.projetloki.genesis
    A library for generating CSS from Java (Tutorial).

    • Uses of PseudoClass in com.projetloki.genesis

      Fields in com.projetloki.genesis declared as PseudoClass 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static PseudoClass PseudoClass.ACTIVE
      Matches when an element is being activated by the user.
      static PseudoClass PseudoClass.CHECKED
      Represents any radio (<input type="radio">), checkbox (<input type="checkbox">) or option (<option> in a <select>) element that is checked or toggled to an on state.
      static PseudoClass PseudoClass.DISABLED
      Represents any disabled element.
      static PseudoClass PseudoClass.EMPTY
      Represents any element that has no children at all.
      static PseudoClass PseudoClass.ENABLED
      Represents any enabled element.
      static PseudoClass PseudoClass.FIRST_CHILD
      Represents any element that is the first child element of its parent.
      static PseudoClass PseudoClass.FIRST_OF_TYPE
      Represents the first sibling of the given type in the list of children of its parent element.
      static PseudoClass PseudoClass.FOCUS
      Applied when a element has received focus, either from the user selecting it with the use of a keyboard or by activating with the mouse.
      static PseudoClass PseudoClass.HOVER
      Matches when the user designates an element with a pointing device, but does not necessarily activate it.
      static PseudoClass PseudoClass.LAST_CHILD
      Represents any element that is the last child element of its parent.
      static PseudoClass PseudoClass.LAST_OF_TYPE
      Represents the last sibling of the given type in the list of children of its parent element.
      static PseudoClass PseudoClass.LINK
      Selects links inside elements.
      static PseudoClass PseudoClass.ONLY_CHILD
      Represents any element which is the only child of its parent.
      static PseudoClass PseudoClass.ONLY_OF_TYPE
      Represents any element that has no siblings of the given type.
      static PseudoClass PseudoClass.ROOT
      Matches the root element of a tree representing the document.
      static PseudoClass PseudoClass.TARGET
      Represents the unique element, if any, with an id matching the fragment identifier of the URI of the document.
      static PseudoClass PseudoClass.VISITED
      Select only links that have been visited.
      Methods in com.projetloki.genesis that return PseudoClass 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static PseudoClass PseudoClass.lang(Locale lang)
      Returns a pseudo-class that matches elements based on the language the element is determined to be in.
      static PseudoClass PseudoClass.not(Selector simpleSelector)
      Returns a pseudo-class that matches elements that are not matched by the given simple selector.
      static PseudoClass PseudoClass.not(String simpleSelector)
      Returns a pseudo-class that matches elements that are not matched by the given simple selector.
      static PseudoClass PseudoClass.nthChild(int n)
      Returns a pseudo-class that matches an element that has exactly n - 1 siblings before it in the document tree, and has a parent element.
      static PseudoClass PseudoClass.nthChild(int a, int b)
      Returns a pseudo-class that matches an element that has exactly an + b - 1 siblings before it in the document tree, for any n >= 0, and has a parent element.
      static PseudoClass PseudoClass.nthLastChild(int n)
      Returns a pseudo-class that matches an element that has exactly n - 1 siblings after it in the document tree, and has a parent element.
      static PseudoClass PseudoClass.nthLastChild(int a, int b)
      Returns a pseudo-class that matches an element that has exactly an + b - 1 siblings after it in the document tree, for any n >= 0, and has a parent element.
      static PseudoClass PseudoClass.nthLastOfType(int n)
      Returns a pseudo-class that matches an element that has exactly n - 1 siblings with the same element type after it in the document tree, and has a parent element.
      static PseudoClass PseudoClass.nthLastOfType(int a, int b)
      Returns a pseudo-class that matches an element that has exactly an + b - 1 siblings with the same element type after it in the document tree, for any n >= 0, and has a parent element.
      static PseudoClass PseudoClass.nthOfType(int n)
      Returns a pseudo-class that matches an element that has exactly n - 1 siblings with the same element type before it in the document tree, and has a parent element.
      static PseudoClass PseudoClass.nthOfType(int a, int b)
      Returns a pseudo-class that matches an element that has exactly an + b - 1 siblings with the same element type before it in the document tree, for any n >= 0, and has a parent element.
      Methods in com.projetloki.genesis with parameters of type PseudoClass 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract Selector Selector.on(PseudoClass pseudoClass)
      Returns a selector matching elements matched by this selector and if the given pseudo-class applies.
